title: Tofu stir-fry
description: An easy, flavour packed recipe that’ll have you passing on a Friday night Chinese takeaway.
ingredients: Thumb-size piece fresh ginger, coarsely grated
Large head broccoli, cut into small florets
2 tbsp fish sauce (you may wish to avoid using  if vegetarian)

method.Step 1: Put the noodles into a large pan of boiling water and cook for 3-4 minutes, then drain and refresh with running cold water.

method.Step 2: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a large wok or frying pan over a high heat, then fry the ginger, garlic and onion, stirring often, until the onion has softened. Add the broccoli florets and shiitake mushrooms and continue to stir-fry until all the vegetables are tender.

method.Step 3: Meanwhile, heat the rest of the oil in a medium frying pan and cook the tofu for 5 minutes or until crisp. Add the noodles, soy sauce, fish sauce and tofu to the wok, then cook, stirring, until the noodles have warmed through. Serve with a scattering of chilli flakes.
